reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: The ultimate goal of this project is to promote the right of access to education for indigenous children in Namibia as well as strenghtening the structures and operations of the Namibia SAN Council. The first objective include activities such as support to secondary highschool and vocational school learners with costs that include materials school fees transport accomodation mentoring etc. These are costs that have become a contraint for the continuation of the schooling. The strengtening of the SAN council include development of advocacy materials training and capacity building particularly related to the right to education and holding a stakeholder meeting.
